description: An organized crime family operating in the Jipangu alternate reality, led by crime boss Buggy the Clown. The organization engages in criminal activities including kidnapping and debt collection, and has connections with corrupt government officials.

keyMoments.title: Conspiracy with Corrupt Official
keyMoments.description: The Buggy Clown Family conspires with a corrupt government official to eliminate Detective Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the criminal organization's reach into government corruption.

keyMoments.title: Kidnapping of Rika
keyMoments.description: The organization kidnaps Rika to collect on Tot-san's debts.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ruthless methods of the crime family.

keyMoments.title: Hatchi Battles Luffy
keyMoments.description: One of the family's powerful subordinates, Hatchi, confronts Luffy during the rescue mission.

keyMoments.title: Gedatsu Battles Luffy
keyMoments.description: Another powerful subordinate, Gedatsu, fights Luffy and Usopp.

reveals.information: Organized crime family in Jipangu led by Buggy
Includes Hatchi and Gedatsu as powerful subordinates
Engages in debt collection, kidnapping, and conspiracy with corrupt officials
